alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Alachua, northern Marion, northwestern Putnam and south central Clay Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawthorne, or near Interlachen, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Hawthorne, George`s Lake, Florahome, Bostwick, Melrose Landing, Orange Springs, Bardin, Hollister and Johnson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
